item.title: physics612
item.description: Accelerator Physics - physics612 Course Accelerator Physics Course No. physics612 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 WT Requirements: Preparation: Form of Testing and Examination: Requirements for the examination (written or oral): successful work with the exercises Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: Understanding of the functional principle of different types of particle accelerators
